text: THE Beckhams sat with their backs to each other as their awkward cold war continued. David, 43, introduced himself to guests at the pre - ceremony dinner alongside pal Dave Gardner. And his friendliness with Rita Ora, 28, in Posh ’ s absence, set tongues wagging.
